DOC.brief_summary: The study design estimate bioavailability amlodipine enalapril maleate fix dose combination ( FDC ) relative co-administration amlodipine enalapril maleate tablet . The rational study provide convenient dose regimen patient . This open-label , randomize , single dose , two-way crossover study , 16 healthy adult male female subject enrol dosed fasting condition . Each subject participate two treatment period 7 day . There least 14 day wash period two dose period follow-up period 21 day treatment period 2 . The total duration study approximately 35 day start first treatment .
DOC.brief_title: A Fixed Dose Combination Amlodipine + Enalapril Bioavailability Study

Alanine aminotransferase , alkaline phosphatase bilirubin < =1.5 x upper limit normal ( ULN ) ( isolated bilirubin > 1.5xULN acceptable bilirubin fractionate direct bilirubin < 35 percent ) . Based single average QT duration correct heart rate ( QTc ) value triplicate electrocardiogram ( ECGs ) obtain brief recording period : QTc Fridericia 's formula < 450 millisecond ( msec ) . Exclusion Criteria Based Upon Medical Histories Current chronic history liver disease , know hepatic biliary abnormality ( With exception Gilbert 's syndrome asymptomatic gallstone ) . History regular alcohol consumption within 6 month study define An average weekly intake > 21 unit male > 14 unit female . In Australia one unit ( =standard drink ) equivalent 10 gram alcohol : 270 mL full strength beer ( 4.8 percent ) , 375 mL mid strength beer ( 3.5 percent ) , 470mL light beer ( 2.7 percent ) , 250 mL premix full strength spirit ( 5 percent ) , 100 mL wine ( 13.5 percent ) 30 mL spirit ( 40 percent ) . History sensitivity study medication , component thereof history drug allergy , opinion investigator GSK Medical Monitor , contraindicate participation . Exclusion Criteria Based Upon Diagnostic Assessments A positive prestudy Hepatitis B surface antigen positive Hepatitis C antibody result within 3 month screen . Urinary cotinine level indicative smoke history regular use tobacco nicotinecontaining product within 6 month prior screen . A positive prestudy drug/alcohol screen . A positive test human immuno virus antibody . Pregnant female determine positive serum hCG test screening time point . Any subject systolic blood pressure < 95 millimeter mercury ( mmHg ) recent history postural symptom . Orthostatic event screening , define symptomatic event ( i.e . dizziness pre syncope syncope ) reduction systolic blood pressure 20mmHg and/or reduction diastolic blood pressure 10 mmHg stand versus supine measurement . Other Exclusion Criteria Where participation study would result donation blood blood product excess 500 mL within 56 day period . Lactating female .
